choose.when: insert into board values (null, #{title }, #{contents }, 0, now(), (select ifnull(max(g_no), 0) + 1 from board a ), 1, 0, #{userNo })

mapper.select: select no, title, contents, g_no as groupNo, o_no as orderNo, depth, user_no as userNo from board where no = #{no }

choose.when: select a.no, a.title, a.hit, a.reg_date, a.user_no, a.g_no, a.o_no, a.depth, b.name, a.user_no from board a join user b on a.user_no = b.no order by g_no desc, o_no asc limit #{startIndex }, #{size }
choose.otherwise: select a.no, a.title, a.hit, a.reg_date, a.user_no, a.g_no, a.o_no, a.depth, b.name, a.user_no from board a join user b on a.user_no = b.no and (title like '%${keyword }%' or contents like '%${keyword }%') order by g_no desc, o_no asc limit #{startIndex }, #{size }
select count(*) from board where (title like '%${_parameter }%' or contents like '%${_parameter }%')
